title: Launching Game Issues
body: When I run LOL, I cant just open it, I have to run as administrator. Not a really big deal, but it's sorta annoying. Any solutions? Thanks

replies.body:
League interacts with a ton of files inside and outside of the League installation directory. Because of this, running it as admin is actually recommended, as it resolves a lot of errors that pop up otherwise. You can set League to always launch as an administrator [here.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/3436-run-administrator-windows-10-a.html#option9) Additionally, you may want to adjust your User Account Control (UAC), which is the window that pops up and asks if something can run as admin with [this link.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions#wq2)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
